channel.title: The FUNNIEST Comedian Ever! GEORGE CARLIN!
channel.description:
This guy is fucking hilarious.
He has got to be the funniest guy ever. If you don't believe me, check out some of these illegally uploaded videos on Google!
http://video.google.com/videosearch?q=george+carlin&hl=en
Don't click on the 10 commandments one, it's funny, but it's only 7 minutes. The others are an hour or so of comedy.
[url=http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=4430459531638940044]Back to Town[/url] and [url=http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-7437159726169149103]Jammin in New York[/url] are also very good! Also try [url=http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-7068677712290004125]Life is Worth Losing[/url]. :)
Enjoy!
~Ron :D

item.title: The FUNNIEST Comedian Ever! GEORGE CARLIN!
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:15, topic:15141”][quote author=coatbridge link=topic=22558.msg271675#msg271675 date=1159171467]
I’ve been watching the video’s ron, I have to say they are very funny but sometimes he pisses me off. He’s very un-ethical.
[/quote]
He’s very right. That guy just speaks the truth. And one day when you grow up in the ‘real world’, most people you meet are unethical. I’m not exactly sure what you mean by that, but I’m guessing the swearing. Cause everything else is just honesty. George Carlin is widely known for being the straightest and honest guy who says it like it is. I respect that.

For the swearing, I don’t really care, cause I swear, my friends swear, and I don’t give a shit about hell, so I do what I want. :)[/quote]
Yes, He speaks the truth alright, the truth how he sees it. No matter what you do or say someone is alway going to disagree with you. He says whats on his mind is a better way of putting it instead of saying he says the truth.

Read full topic
item.source: The FUNNIEST Comedian Ever! GEORGE CARLIN!

item.title: The FUNNIEST Comedian Ever! GEORGE CARLIN!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

coatbridge:

I’ve been watching the video’s ron, I have to say they are very funny but sometimes he pisses me off. He’s very un-ethical.

He’s very right. That guy just speaks the truth. And one day when you grow up in the ‘real world’, most people you meet are unethical. I’m not exactly sure what you mean by that, but I’m guessing the swearing. Cause everything else is just honesty. George Carlin is widely known for being the straightest and honest guy who says it like it is. I respect that.

For the swearing, I don’t really care, cause I swear, my friends swear, and I don’t give a shit about hell, so I do what I want.

Read full topic

item.title: The FUNNIEST Comedian Ever! GEORGE CARLIN!
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:11, topic:15141”][quote author=Starblaster100 link=topic=22558.msg270659#msg270659 date=1159152762]
russell peters - the best comedian ever






[br][size=1]Posted at: September 25, 2006, 12:47:27 AM[/size][hr]this is the best sketch he does. if youre gonna watch one of them, watch this one


[/quote]
HEY!!! NO TALKING OF OTHER COMEDIANS HERE!!! lol.

Yeah Russell Peters is a pretty smart Indian guy. We Indians rule.

My cousin from Boston told me about him. He’s pretty funny. Star, tell me what you think of George Carlin. I will bet my balls, you will like him. If you don’t then I’ll have to come over and hit you lol jk.[/quote]

yea carlin is pretty funyy, i like it. and ive already been hit, enough for this month

item.title: The FUNNIEST Comedian Ever! GEORGE CARLIN!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

therealjdb:

LMFAO i just was watching this guy last night on Comedy Central he is like my favorite Comedian!!!

Haha funny coincidense. I downloaded all his movies last night. lol. Glad you enjoy him too.

Did you know in the 1970s when he was hopped up on drugs, he was arrested for indecent exposure or something lol. Man that guy has done every single drug known to George (which is more than known to man).
